description:
Today around 21:00 I opened my wallet on Phantom, @rady72 and found out that all my solans were transferd to 2ec7ifTLBg1hC6ys5uSNEzn1qUMhdSiFmqbvEcRKKxAi. I do not know who is this user, I have not done the transfer, no one has access to my account, and my phone doesn't appear to be hacked. I hope some one can help me recover the money
